relation: The Elite jersey is the retail version of the on-field jersey the Team wears. Engineered and constructed with similar attributes as those worn on the field. Designed for the fan who wants to look and feel like a Pro! The Elite has sewn on tackle twill numbers and letters for authenticity. Designed for total comfort and movement with strategic ventilation that provides breathability.
Elite jersey construction is nylon/spandex for the home (green)jersey, and is polyester/spandex for the away (white) jerseys. Has ribbed knit v-neck taping at collar.
Sewn on tackle twill on sewn down name plaque.
Nike logo on both upper sleeves. NFL shield on bottom of front collar. Jock tag with numeric sizing is applied to the lower left bottom.

The Limited jersey is inspired by what the players are wearing on the field. Designed for total comfort and movement, with strategic ventilation for breathability. Athletic-fit jersey has sewn down tackle twill numbers and letters for an authentic look.
Limited jersey construction is 100% recycled polyester basic interlock for home (green) jerseys and 100% polyester knit for the away (white) jerseys. Has ribbed knit v-neck taping at collar.
Sewn on tackle twill on sewn down name plaque.
Applique Nike logo on both upper sleeves. NFL shield on bottom of front collar. Jock tag with alpha sizing is applied to lower left bottom.

Game jerseys feature the same designs as Elite jerseys, but have printed player name and numbers. Jerseys are designed for total comfort and movement, and have strategic ventilation that provides breathability. Game jerseys are designed for the price conscious fan.
Game jersey construction is 100% recycled polyester knit for the home (green) jerseys and 100% polyester knit for the away (white) jerseys. Has ribbed knit v-neck taping at collar.
Screen-printed on sewn down name plaque.
Screen-printed Nike logo on both upper sleeves. NFL shield on bottom of front collar. Jock tag with alpha sizing is applied to the lower left bottom.

Women's Game jerseys have the same look as a real player's jersey, but are cut for a woman with a tailored fit. Printed player name and numbers. Jerseys are designed for total comfort and movement, and have strategic ventilation that provides breathability.
Women's Game jersey construction is 100% recycled polyester knit. Has ribbed knit v-neck taping at collar.
Screen-printed on sewn down name plaque.
Screen-printed Nike logo on both upper sleeves. NFL shield on bottom of front collar. Jock tag is applied to the lower left bottom.

Kids' Game jerseys have the same look as a real player's jersey. Printed player name and numbers. Jerseys are designed for total comfort and movement, and have strategic ventilation that provides breathability. Kids' Game jerseys are available in youth boys and girls, pre-school, toddler, and infant sizes.
Kids' Game jersey construction is a 100% polyester knit body with mesh side panels. Has ribbed knit v-neck taping at collar.
Kids' youth jersey has screen-printed name on sewn down name plaque. On all other kids' sizes, player name is screen-printed directly on the back.
Screen-printed Nike logo on both upper sleeves. NFL shield is applied on the bottom of front collar. Jock tag with alpha sizing is applied to the lower left bottom.
textBeforeTable: Jersey Buyer's Guide How to buy a Green Bay Packers NFL jersey When purchasing a Packers jersey, it's important to know what type of jersey you're looking for. Our Game jerseys are for the price conscious fan who wants to show their team pride. Our Elite jersey gives you the same look and quality as the jerseys worn by the players on the field. Each jersey shows you're a true fan, and the chart below is designed to help you choose the one that's best for you. Wish List Visit the Packers Pro Shop Track Your Order Jersey Buyer's Guide
